briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of KPI-121 in Subjects With Postsurgical Inflammation and Pain
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-Masked, Randomized, Controlled Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of KPI-121 1.0% Ophthalmic Suspension in Subjects With Postsurgical Inflammation and Pain
conditions: Post Surgical Ocular Inflammation and Pain

interventions.name: Vehicle of KPI-121 Ophthalmic Suspension dosed BID

summary: The primary objective of the study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of KPI-121 1.0% ophthalmic suspension compared to placebo in subjects who have undergone cataract surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Complete Resolution of Anterior Chamber (AC) Cells at Day 8
